The Payoff Loan™

How it Works

Are you overwhelmed by credit card bills? Instead of managing multiple, high-interest payments each month, Payoff simplifies them down to one monthly payment. With lower rates than your credit cards, the Payoff Loan™ is designed to get rid of $5,000 to $25,000 of your credit card debt as quickly as possible.

You can take control and start effectively managing and reducing your debt today. You may even see an increase in your credit score.†

  • Apply Online - Our online application is both easy and free.
  • Receive Money - If you're approved, our online application process only takes a few minutes to complete. We'll electronically deposit money directly into your designated bank account.
  • Pay Off Cards - Use the money to pay off your credit card balances. You can even keep your credit cards - although we recommend you put them in a drawer or your freezer!
  • Simplify Bills - Manage your loan payments with our easy-to-use website. We designed it specifically to help you succeed in reaching your goal of paying off your credit cards faster.

Key Benefits

  • Consolidate your credit card bills into one monthly payment
  • Pay off your debt faster
  • Lower your overall interest rates
  • Improve your credit score†
  • Eliminate fees (no late fees, no prepayment fees, no hidden fine print)
  • Experience our outstanding Payoff Success Team
  • Security and privacy*

Want to find out more? The Payoff Success Team is based in California and is ready to help:

Speak with a Member Advocate: 1-800-878-0901
Email us: success@payoff.com

†Obtaining a Payoff Loan™ does not guarantee your credit score will improve. Always check your credit report regularly to understand what factors affect your credit.
*Your privacy is priceless. We do not and will never sell your personal information to anyone, for any reason, ever. Please view our Privacy Policy for more information.

Features

Credit cards are made to keep you in debt and to pay the credit card companies as long as possible. We are not okay with that. We designed the Payoff Loan™ to be personalized to you and help you pay off your credit cards faster.

Safe Rate Check

Checking your Payoff Loan rate will not affect your credit score.

Improve Your Score

Paying off your credit cards lowers your utilization and improves your credit score.

Faster Pay Off

Tired of not making an impact with your minimum payment? With a Payoff Loan, you'll pay off your credit card and get out of debt faster.

Save Money

Fixed monthly payments save you money compared to paying what your credit card company suggests.

Simplified Payment

No more juggling multiple credit card bills each month. Make one easy payment with the Payoff Loan.

Quick and Simple

Be on your way to paying off your credit cards in just 4 easy steps.

Direct Deposit

Your money is electronically deposited directly into your account so you can pay off those cards ASAP.

No Card Cutting

Paying off your cards without closing them benefits your score.

Rates & Fees

We want you to be out of credit card debt in just a few years. The Payoff Loan offers a low, fixed rate, and getting a quote only takes minutes and doesn’t impact your credit score.

We’re on your side. That means simplifying fees and eliminating common ones, like late fees and prepayment penalties, that you see elsewhere. This is about defeating debt together, and neither of us can win with fees holding us back from our goals.

We offer fixed rates between 6.00% (8% APR) and 19.65% (22% APR) for loan amounts from $5,000 to $25,000. Currently, the maximum APR in NY is 16%.

No teaser or introductory rates that change after 12 or 18 months. This is about reducing your interest rate versus your credit cards, saving you thousands of dollars in interest and years of paying back debt. It’s as simple as that.

Start saving immediately! Check your rate at no risk in 60 seconds.

Fees We’ve Eliminated

Many credit card companies and lenders charge small, hidden fees that aren't in your best interest. We wouldn't want to be charged those fees either. They don't help you get out of debt, so we've eliminated them.

  • No Application Fees - Our online application is both easy and free.
  • No Prepayment Penalties or Fees - We want you to use any extra money you earn to pay down your balance.
  • No Late Fees - We understand the fear of a paycheck not coming on time, so we don’t charge late payments.
  • No Check Processing Fees - If you ever have to pay via check, instead of the standard automatic withdrawal, that’s fine by us.
  • No Annual Fees - We charge $0 in annual fees for the life of your loan, unlike many credit card companies.

Payoff Platform Fee

We’ve simplified the true loan cost by combining the origination fee/closing fee and the maintenance fee into one: the Payoff Platform Fee. The Payoff Platform Fee includes the same costs as any other loan, and our rates are competitive with other lenders. This amount covers all of our services and is the full difference between the interest rate and the effective APR.

This one-time fee is deducted from your requested amount at the time your loan is issued.

The Payoff Platform fee ranges from 2% - 5%, and is based on the length of the loan.

Loan Term 24-Month 36-Month 48-Month 60-Month
Origination Fee 2.00% 3.00% 4.00% 5.00%

Returned Payment Fee

A $15 fee may be charged if we can’t process your loan payment (for example, if there’s not enough money in your account to make your payment), which helps us offset the bank charges from failed payment transactions.

This is the only other fee we charge.

† Rates depicted are accurate as of September 25, 2015.

Check My Rate

Getting Approved

At Payoff, we want you to understand what goes into our decision process (the bankers call it underwriting) when reviewing your Payoff Loan™ application. That's why we're committed to giving you clear and simple explanations of the factors that we, and our bank partners, use and why we use them.

FICO Score

Your FICO score summarizes your credit history in an easy-to-understand number. It doesn't tell your whole story though, so we use others factors too.

Requirement: A score of 660 or higher.

Debt-To-Income Ratio (Unsecured)

Debt-to-income ratio (DTI) is your total unsecured debt (personal loans, credit cards, etc.) divided by your annual income. A low debt-to-income ratio demonstrates a good balance between debt and income.

Requirement: A DTI less than or equal to 50%.

Age of Credit History

Age of credit history is the total length of time you've been using credit. This shows your credit maturity starting from your first line of credit, so remember to keep your old cards open.

Requirement: At least 3 years of credit.

Open and Satisfactory Trades

Open and satisfactory trades are the lines of credit on which you've opened and made payments on time. Making on-time payments is an important part of paying off your credit cards.

Requirement: At least 2 open and satisfactory trades and no more than one installment loan within the last 12 months.

Delinquencies

Credit delinquencies are payments that you owe and have not currently paid. If you have any, we suggest resolving these before applying for a Payoff Loan™ for your best chance of approval.

Requirement: No current delinquencies. Also, no delinquencies greater than 90 days within the last 12 months.

Payoff works with a bank partner to ultimately originate loans. First Electronic Bank issues all loans made using the Payoff Platform. First Electronic Bank is an FDIC insured Utah-chartered industrial bank located in Salt Lake City, Utah, Member FDIC and Equal Housing Lender. Individual borrowers must be a US citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Valid bank account and social security number are required. All loans are subject to credit review and approval. Your actual rate depends upon credit score, loan amount, loan term, credit usage and history. You must be a US citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Currently loans are not offered in: AL, AZ, CO, CT, DE, IL, IN, IA, KS, LA, ME, MA, MN, NH, NJ, NY, PA, SD, VT, TX, WI, and WY. Our mailing address is: Payoff, Inc., 3200 Park Center Drive, STE 800, Costa Mesa, CA 92626.
